<Text: Château de Druyes:  It was as much a noble residence as it was a fortified castle.>
Triplets:<Château de Druyes
3:
--------------------
Text: Château de Druyes:  It was a frequented dwelling place of Peter II of Courtenay, the Emperor of Constantinople in the 13th century, and his daughter Matilda, Countess of Nevers, Auxerre and Tonnerre.
Triplets:<Peter II
